item.title: Critical Role Series: Attendance
item.description: Spell Ingredients This spell is written in the R language, and requires: magrittr dplyr tidyr tibble ggplot2 ggthemes Introduction This is a short exploratory data analysis of attendance on the web series Critical Role, in which voice actors play Dungeons and Dragoooooooons! It is a fantastic show, and some of the amazing people at Crit Role Stats have been tracking “monster stats, dice rolls, and anything else that can be quantified on Critical Role”.
